short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will create a force field that annihilate pink background color from the Scalesbot web app for good.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scalesbot Antipink will shield you from pinkness in Scalesbot original UI offering a better life for all users in the long run.

Basically turns pink background gray.
